```{r}
#0. read in data and library -----------------------------------------------------------
path <- "~/PetGit/ImputationClusterAnalysis/"
setwd(path)

library(data.table)

library(Rcpp)

prop.sale <- fread(data.url,na.strings = c(""," ",NA,"NA"))
```
